scripts.build: npx tailwindcss -i ./src/assets/css/main.css -o ./static/assets/main.css && eleventy --config=.eleventy.cjs && node src/generators/sitemap.cjs && node src/generators/rss.cjs && npx cleancss -o ./dist/assets/main.css ./dist/assets/main.css
scripts.lint: find src scripts _data test -type f '(' -name '*.js' -o -name '*.mjs' -o -name '*.cjs' ')' -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 node --check
scripts.meta: npm run lint && npm test && npm run prebuild && npm run build
